meanings.definition: The activity of keeping order and enforcing laws in a community.
meanings.sent1: Policing in our town ensures everyone follows the rules.
meanings.sent2: The police are responsible for policing the streets and ensuring safety.
meanings.sent3: The strict policing of the playground by the teacher made sure no one misbehaved.
meanings.sent4: Her constant policing of the office environment created a sense of discipline.
meanings.sent5: The efficient policing of the event made it a peaceful gathering.

meanings.definition: The practice of regulating and controlling a situation or activity.
meanings.sent1: Effective policing of the budget helped us stay within our limits.
meanings.sent2: The strict policing of the construction site prevented accidents.
meanings.sent3: His constant policing of the kitchen cabinets kept snacks from disappearing.
meanings.sent4: The careful policing of the traffic flow ensured a smooth commute.
meanings.sent5: The vigilant policing of the exam room prevented cheating incidents.
